wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Thanks for the kind words. The only chop-busting I'm signing up for is to bust into some chops with you and Jules at Jak's Grill the next time I'm out. Keep up the good work, and remember - a home Automatic External Defibrillator is just as necessary as that box of bandaids in the medicine cabinet - don't leave home without it (not!)
Chris
